name: HSK 3.0 Band 1 - Daily Communication & Numbers
description: Essential words for basic conversations, asking questions, and counting. Perfect for your first interactions in Chinese!

name: HSK 3.0 Band 1 - People & Relationships
description: Words for family members, friends, and describing people. Learn how to talk about yourself and others!

name: HSK 3.0 Band 1 - Food & Dining
description: All about food, restaurants, and eating. Master ordering meals and expressing your preferences!

name: HSK 3.0 Band 1 - Places & Transportation
description: Navigate cities and talk about locations. Perfect for finding your way around and asking for directions!

name: HSK 3.0 Band 1 - Daily Activities
description: Verbs and actions for your everyday routines. Talk about what you're doing, plan activities, and share your experiences!

name: HSK 3.0 Band 1 - Descriptions & Qualities
description: Adjectives and describing words to express qualities and feelings. Make your Chinese more colorful and expressive!

name: HSK 3.0 Band 1 - School & Learning
description: Vocabulary for the classroom, studying, and education. Essential for students and anyone talking about learning!
